elements.textContent:
Tug of War: Featured from 1900 to 1920, with teams of eight competing.
Solo Synchronized Swimming: Competed only in 1984 and 1992, required swimmers to perform routines alone.
Plunge for Distance: 1904 Olympic sport where competitors dove in a pool and stayed motionless underwater until resurfacing.
Live Pigeon Shooting: 1900 Olympics featured this event where over 300 birds were killed.
Rope Climb: Gymnasts competed in rope climb for speed at the 1896, 1904, 1924, and 1932 games.
